  Ancillary klinp
    Type sword

  Effect Construction  10
    Effect Squalor -2
    Effect PersonalSecurity  2
    Effect HitPoints 2

;===============================================================
;== unique TRIGGERS START HERE ==============================
;===============================================================

          Trigger hagcup_vnv_trigger
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait hag = 1

    AcquireAncillary hagcup chance  100

;------------------------------------------

           Trigger anakondasword_vnv_trigger
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait anakonda = 1

    AcquireAncillary anakondasword chance  100

;------------------------------------------

           Trigger anakondaarmor_vnv_trigger
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait anakonda = 1

    AcquireAncillary anakondaarmor chance  100

;------------------------------------------

           Trigger anakondasword_vnv_trigger
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait anakonda1 = 1

    AcquireAncillary anakondasword chance  100

;------------------------------------------

           Trigger anakondaarmor_vnv_trigger
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait anakonda1 = 1

    AcquireAncillary anakondaarmor chance  100

;------------------------------------------

         Trigger vesperoduelist_vnv_trigger
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait Vespero = 1

    AcquireAncillary vesperoduelist chance  100


;------------------------------------------
          Trigger vesperomask_vnv_trigger
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait Vespero = 1

    AcquireAncillary vesperomask chance  100

;------------------------------------------

          Trigger Emperor_0
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType hre
          and IsFactionLeader
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
          and not HasAncType topor
          and not HasAncType sword

    AcquireAncillary molemp chance  100

;------------------------------------------
          Trigger Emperor_1
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType hre
          and IsFactionLeader
          and not HasAncType armour

    AcquireAncillary dosemp chance  100
;------------------------------------------
          Trigger Emperor_2
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType hre
          and IsFactionLeader
          and not HasAncType Item

    AcquireAncillary medemp chance  100

;------------------------------------------
          Trigger ArUlrik
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType scotland
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Arulrik = 1

    AcquireAncillary molbel chance  100

;------------------------------------------
          Trigger MinerLeader
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType poland
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait MinerLeader = 1

    AcquireAncillary kirkaminer chance  100

;------------------------------------------
          Trigger Engineer_signet
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType poland
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait EngineerLeader = 1

    AcquireAncillary Engineer_signet chance  100

;------------------------------------------
          Trigger CapHammer
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType poland
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait CapKingsHam = 1

    AcquireAncillary CapHammer chance  100

;------------------------------------------
          Trigger Diploma_1
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition CultureType greek
    and AgentType = diplomat

    AcquireAncillary diploma chance  100

;------------------------------------------
          Trigger Diploma_2
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition CultureType northern_european
    and AgentType = diplomat

    AcquireAncillary diploma chance  100
;------------------------------------------
          Trigger Diploma_3
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition CultureType southern_european
    and AgentType = diplomat

    AcquireAncillary diploma chance  100

;------------------------------------------
          Trigger Diploma_4
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition CultureType eastern_european
    and AgentType = diplomat

    AcquireAncillary diploma chance  100

	Trigger Diploma_5
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition CultureType Nord_culture
    and AgentType = diplomat

    AcquireAncillary diploma chance  100

	Trigger Diploma_6
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition CultureType middle_eastern
    and AgentType = diplomat

    AcquireAncillary diploma chance  100

	Trigger Diploma_7
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType skaven
    and AgentType = diplomat

    AcquireAncillary diploma chance  100

              Trigger Selena
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType hre
          and Trait Bogun = 1

    AcquireAncillary lut chance  100

              Trigger Reiksmarshall
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType hre
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Reiksmarshall = 1

    AcquireAncillary runklykrei chance  100


              Trigger GrandMasterBull
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType byzantium
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait GrandMasterBull = 1

    AcquireAncillary GrandMasterBullAxe chance  100


              Trigger knyaz_1
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType kalmar_union
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait knyaz_1 = 1

    AcquireAncillary knyaz_1_anc chance  100

              Trigger knyaz_2
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType kalmar_union
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait knyaz_2 = 1

    AcquireAncillary knyaz_2_anc chance  100

			  Trigger knyaz_3
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType kalmar_union
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait knyaz_3 = 1

    AcquireAncillary knyaz_3_anc chance  100

			  Trigger knyaz_4
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType kalmar_union
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait knyaz_4 = 1

    AcquireAncillary knyaz_4_anc chance  100

			  Trigger knyaz_5
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType kalmar_union
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait knyaz_5 = 1

    AcquireAncillary knyaz_5_anc chance  100

			  Trigger bord_sword
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType kalmar_union
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Factionleader = 1

    AcquireAncillary bord_sword_anc chance  100


;------------------------------------------
          Trigger SlayerKing
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType poland
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait KingSlayer = 1

    AcquireAncillary toporub chance  100

;------------------------------------------
          Trigger Savage
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType turks
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Savage = 1

    AcquireAncillary dubvo chance  100
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;empire new triggers;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

Trigger simsig_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition  Attribute Piety > 3
          and Attribute Command > 3
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 20
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and InEnemyLands
          and Treasury > 4000
          and IsGeneral
          and not FactionType hungary
          and not Routs
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists simsig

    AcquireAncillary simsig chance  30

    Trigger posoh_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= alchemists_lab
          and IsGeneral
          and  CultureType southern_european
           and not FactionType hungary
          and not HasAncType sword
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
           and Attribute Command > 3


    AcquireAncillary posoh chance  29

    Trigger pech_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat

          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 66
          and  CultureType southern_european
           and not FactionType hungary
           and WonBattle


    AcquireAncillary pech chance  28

    Trigger Blackomur_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists Blackomur


    AcquireAncillary Blackomur chance  10

    Trigger belpla_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= alchemists_lab
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_1
          and IsGeneral
          and  CultureType southern_european
           and not FactionType hungary
           and Attribute Authority > 2


    AcquireAncillary belpla chance  27

    Trigger neframul_vnv_trigger
     WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition Attribute Piety > 3
          and Attribute Command > 2
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 20
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and InEnemyLands
          and IsGeneral
           and not FactionType hungary


    AcquireAncillary neframul chance  26


    Trigger sigmar_vnv_trigger
   WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 66
          and  CultureType southern_european
           and not FactionType hungary
           and Treasury > 10000
           and not Routs


    AcquireAncillary sigmar chance  25

    Trigger savan_vnv_trigger
     WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and IsGeneral
          and  CultureType southern_european
           and not FactionType hungary
           and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists savan
           and Treasury > 7000
           and Attribute Authority > 2


    AcquireAncillary savan chance  24

    Trigger shlemskav_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat

          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 66
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType shlem
           and not FactionType hungary
           and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists shlemskav
           and WonBattle


    AcquireAncillary shlemskav chance  23


    Trigger shigorg_vnv_trigger
     WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition Attribute Piety > 3
          and Attribute Command > 2
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 20
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and InEnemyLands
          and IsGeneral
          and not HasAncType shield
           and not FactionType hungary
           and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists shigorg


    AcquireAncillary shigorg chance  22

    Trigger nebdos_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and IsGeneral
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType armour
           and not FactionType hungary


    AcquireAncillary nebdos chance  21

    Trigger tardos_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition Attribute Piety > 3
          and Attribute Command > 2
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 50
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and InEnemyLands
          and IsGeneral
          and not HasAncType armour
           and not FactionType hungary
           and not Routs


    AcquireAncillary tardos chance  20

    Trigger dosras_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat

          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 66
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType armour
           and not FactionType hungary
                      and Treasury > 6000
           and Attribute Chivalry > 2


    AcquireAncillary dosras chance  19

Trigger draksword_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 66
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType sword
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
           and not FactionType hungary
           and WonBattle


    AcquireAncillary draksword chance  18

    Trigger magdos_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 66
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType armour
           and not FactionType hungary
                      and Treasury > 5000
           and Attribute Chivalry > -2


    AcquireAncillary magdos chance  17




    Trigger runklyk_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType sword
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
           and not FactionType hungary
           and not FactionType kalmar_union
           and not FactionType hre
           and IsFactionLeader



    AcquireAncillary runklyk chance  100

       Trigger molotprav_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and IsGeneral
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType sword
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
           and not FactionType hungary
           and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists molotprav
                      and Treasury > 4000
           and Attribute Command > 3



    AcquireAncillary molotprav chance  16

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 30
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType sword
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
           and not FactionType hungary
           and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists pravedstal
                      and Treasury > 7000
           and Attribute Command > 3
           and not Routs


    AcquireAncillary pravedstal chance  15

          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command > 2
and  CultureType southern_european
and not HasAncType ring
 and not FactionType hungary

         and  CultureType southern_european
     and not FactionType hungary

    Trigger bras_vnv_trigger
     WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType hungary
          and Treasury > 10000
and Attribute Command > 3


    AcquireAncillary bras chance  24

    Trigger korpro_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 66
          and FactionType hungary
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists korpro
          and not Routs

    AcquireAncillary korpro chance  23


    Trigger kolkar_vnv_trigger
     WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition Attribute Piety > 3
          and Attribute Command > 2
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 20
          and InEnemyLands
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary kolkar chance  22

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType hungary
          and not HasAncType znamaa
          and Treasury > 4000
and Attribute Chivalry > -2

    Trigger swordem_vnv_trigger
     WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType denmark
             and not HasAncType sword
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists swordem
          and Treasury > 8000
and Attribute Chivalry > -2


    AcquireAncillary swordem chance  34

    WhenToTest PostBattle

          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 66
          and FactionType lithuania
           and not HasAncType sword
          and not HasAncType spear

          and GeneralFoughtInCombat

          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 66
          and FactionType novgorod
            and not HasAncType sword
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists bulgno

    Trigger toporra_vnv_trigger
     WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and IsGeneral
                    and Treasury > 8000
and Attribute Chivalry > -2
             and not HasAncType sword
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
          and not HasAncType topor
and  CultureType middle_eastern
and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists toporra


    AcquireAncillary toporra chance  24

          and GeneralFoughtInCombat

    Trigger topmo_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat

          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 66
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
          and not HasAncType topor
and  CultureType middle_eastern
          and Treasury > 5000
and Attribute Command > 3
and WonBattle


    AcquireAncillary topmo chance  18




    Trigger hitshto_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and IsGeneral
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
          and not HasAncType topor
and  CultureType middle_eastern
and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists hitshto


    AcquireAncillary hitshto chance  17

       Trigger kinud_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and IsGeneral
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
          and not HasAncType topor
and  CultureType middle_eastern
          and Treasury > 7000
and Attribute Chivalry > -2



    AcquireAncillary kinud chance  16

          and GeneralFoughtInCombat

             and not HasAncType armour
and  CultureType middle_eastern
and WonBattle

     WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and IsGeneral
                    and Treasury > 8000
and Attribute Chivalry > -2
             and not HasAncType sword
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
          and not HasAncType topor
and  CultureType northern_european
and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists klinp


    AcquireAncillary klinp chance  26

          and GeneralFoughtInCombat

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;things ancillaries

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trick_abacus_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= market_2

    AcquireAncillary trick_abacus chance  5


    Trigger assassins_blade
    WhenToTest AssassinationMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and AgentType = assassin
          and DistanceCapital > 55

    AcquireAncillary assassins_blade chance  5

    Trigger spyglass_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = spy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= dockyard

    AcquireAncillary spyglass chance  20


 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger assassininit11
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= smith_4

    AcquireAncillary handgun chance  33


    Trigger agents16
    WhenToTest SabotageMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and I_TurnNumber > 35

    AcquireAncillary explosives chance  50

    ;------------------------------------------
Trigger exotic_gifts_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= market_4

    AcquireAncillary exotic_gifts chance  33



    Trigger princess_dad_has_authority
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherAttribute Authority > 4
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary faithful_servant chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger pet_guard_dog_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and  CultureType southern_european
           and not FactionType hungary
          and IsGeneral
          and TimeInRegion > 4


    AcquireAncillary pet_guarddog chance  8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger pet_bloodhound_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AssassinationMission
    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and MissionSucceeded
          and not InEnemyLands
          and  CultureType southern_european
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary pet_bloodhound chance  4

Trigger trusty_steed_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_2
          and Trait GoodCavalryGeneral >= 1
          and IsGeneral
          and  CultureType southern_european
         and not HasAncType Horse
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary trusty_steed chance  15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger strapping_stallion_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition AgentType = princess
          and FactionBuildingExists = stables_2
          and  CultureType southern_european
         and not HasAncType Horse
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary strapping_stallion chance  25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger swift_steed_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and FactionBuildingExists >= horse_breeders_guild
          and  CultureType southern_european
         and not HasAncType Horse
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary swift_steed chance  33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spyinit8
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = spy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_2
          and  CultureType southern_european
         and not HasAncType Horse
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary black_stallion chance  33

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = spy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= horse_breeders_guild
          and  CultureType southern_european
         and not HasAncType Horse
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary black_stallion chance  33

    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and  CultureType southern_european
         and not HasAncType Horse
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary black_stallion chance  33

    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= horse_breeders_guild
          and  CultureType southern_european
         and not HasAncType Horse
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary black_stallion chance  33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_castle_with_stables_dread
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_2
          and Attribute Chivalry < -4
          and  CultureType southern_european
         and not HasAncType Horse
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary black_stallion chance  4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger swift_steed_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and FactionBuildingExists >= horse_breeders_guild
          and  CultureType southern_european
         and not HasAncType Horse
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary swift_steed chance  33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger strapping_stallion_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition AgentType = princess
          and FactionBuildingExists = stables_4
          and  CultureType southern_european
         and not HasAncType Horse
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary strapping_stallion chance  25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trusty_steed_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_3
          and Trait GoodCavalryGeneral >= 1
          and IsGeneral
          and  CultureType southern_european
         and not HasAncType Horse
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary trusty_steed chance  15


;------------------------------------------
Trigger pet_guard_dog_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and  CultureType southern_european
           and not FactionType hungary
          and IsGeneral
          and TimeInRegion > 4


    AcquireAncillary pet_guarddog chance  8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger pet_squig_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
           and FactionType moors
          and IsGeneral
          and TimeInRegion > 4


    AcquireAncillary pet_squig chance  8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger pet_wolf_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
           and FactionType turks
          and IsGeneral
          and TimeInRegion > 4


    AcquireAncillary pet_wolf chance  8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger pet_lion_1_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and  CultureType northern_european
         and not HasAncType Pet
          and IsGeneral
          and TimeInRegion > 4


    AcquireAncillary pet_lion_1 chance  8

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and  CultureType northern_european
         and not HasAncType Pet
          and IsGeneral
          and TimeInRegion > 4


    AcquireAncillary pet_lion_2 chance  8

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and  CultureType northern_european
         and not HasAncType Pet
          and IsGeneral
          and TimeInRegion > 4


    AcquireAncillary pet_lion_3 chance  8


;------------------------------------------
Trigger mount_boar_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= orcz_stables_2
          and IsGeneral
           and FactionType turks
         and not HasAncType Horse

    AcquireAncillary mount_boar chance  15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_castle_with_stables_mount_boar
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= orcz_stables_1
           and FactionType turks
         and not HasAncType Horse

    AcquireAncillary mount_boar chance  4

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= orcz_stables_2
          and IsGeneral
           and FactionType moors
         and not HasAncType Horse

    AcquireAncillary mount_squig chance  15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_castle_with_stables_mount_squig
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= orcz_stables_1
           and FactionType moors
         and not HasAncType Horse

    AcquireAncillary mount_squig chance  4

Trigger hp_potion_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= brothel
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command > 3

    AcquireAncillary hp_potion chance  3

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= alchemists_lab
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command > 3

    AcquireAncillary hp_potion chance  5
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command > 4

    AcquireAncillary hp_potion chance  1

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;new ancillaru new triggers;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

Trigger meshol_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
        Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_2
          and Attribute Finance > 2
          and  CultureType southern_european
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary meshzol chance  30

    Trigger sunzol_vnv_trigger
   WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
        Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_2
          and Attribute Finance > 4
          and  CultureType southern_european
           and not FactionType hungary


    AcquireAncillary sunzol chance  29

    Trigger sapfir_vnv_trigger
   WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
        Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_2
          and Attribute Management > 3
          and  CultureType southern_european
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary sapfir chance  27

Trigger cherbri_vnv_trigger
   WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
        Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_2
          and Attribute Management = 4
          and  CultureType southern_european
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary cherbri chance  26

Trigger kosti_vnv_trigger
   WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
        Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_2
          and Attribute Influence > 3
          and  CultureType southern_european
           and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary kosti chance  25


Trigger docum_vnv_trigger
   WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
        Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_2
          and Attribute Influence > 5
          and  CultureType southern_european
           and not FactionType hungary
           and Treasury > 7000

    AcquireAncillary docum chance  25

    Trigger anti_vnv_trigger
     WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and IsGeneral
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and  CultureType northern_european
           and not FactionType hungary
           and Treasury > 7000
           and Attribute Authority > 2


    AcquireAncillary anti chance  24

    Trigger zelle_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 66
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType Item
           and  CultureType southern_european
          and  CultureType northern_european
           and not FactionType hungary
           and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists zelle
           and WonBattle


    AcquireAncillary zelle chance  23


    Trigger cherep_vnv_trigger
     WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition Attribute Piety < 3
          and Attribute Command > 2
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 20
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and InEnemyLands
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType hungary


    AcquireAncillary cherep chance  22

    Trigger ches_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and IsGeneral
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType Item
           and FactionType hungary


    AcquireAncillary ches chance  21

    Trigger roguk_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition Attribute Piety > 3
          and Attribute Command > 2
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 50
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and InEnemyLands
          and IsGeneral
          and not HasAncType armour
           and not FactionType hungary
           and not Routs


    AcquireAncillary roguk chance  20

    Trigger sergor_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 66
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType armour
           and not FactionType hungary
                      and Treasury > 6000
           and Attribute Chivalry > 2


    AcquireAncillary sergor chance  19

Trigger mixsi_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 66
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType sword
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
           and not FactionType hungary
           and WonBattle


    AcquireAncillary mixsi chance  18




       Trigger mechb_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and IsGeneral
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType sword
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
           and not FactionType hungary
           and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists mechb
                      and Treasury > 4000
           and Attribute Command > 3



    AcquireAncillary mechb chance  16


Trigger skar_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 30
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType sword
          and not HasAncType spear
          and not HasAncType molot
           and not FactionType hungary
           and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists skar
                      and Treasury > 7000
           and Attribute Command > 3
           and not Routs


    AcquireAncillary skar chance  15

    Trigger draksh_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 70
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType shlem
           and not FactionType hungary
           and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists draksh


    AcquireAncillary draksh chance  14

Trigger poszak_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat

          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 28
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType shield
           and not FactionType hungary
           and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists poszak
           and WonBattle


    AcquireAncillary poszak chance  13





    Trigger zachs_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 77
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType shield
           and not FactionType hungary
           and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists zachs

    AcquireAncillary zachs chance  11

    Trigger stag_vnv_trigger
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists = stables_2
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command > 2
and  CultureType southern_european
and not HasAncType znamaa
 and not FactionType hungary
 and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists stag
 and Treasury > 10000
and Attribute Command > 3



    AcquireAncillary stag chance  10


    Trigger znagne_vnv_trigger
       WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
         and Attribute Command > 3
         and  CultureType southern_european
and not HasAncType znamaa
 and not FactionType hungary
 and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists znagne

      AcquireAncillary znagne chance  5


    Trigger znav_vnv_trigger
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists = stables_1
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command > 3
          and  CultureType southern_european
           and not FactionType hungary
           and not HasAncType znamaa
           and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists znav


    AcquireAncillary znav chance  6

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Trigger trebnik_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AssassinationMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and AgentType = assassin
          and DistanceCapital < 20
           and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary trebnik chance  10

    Trigger rapira_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest SabotageMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and AgentType = assassin
           and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary rapira chance  10

    Trigger golov_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AssassinationMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and AgentType = assassin
          and I_TurnNumber > 50
           and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary golov chance  20

    Trigger brnoshk_vnv_trigger
   WhenToTest SabotageMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and AgentType = assassin
          and DistanceCapital < 20
           and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary brnosh chance  5

    Trigger pistol_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AssassinationMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and AgentType = assassin
          and DistanceCapital < 20
           and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary pistol chance  3

    Trigger tabak_vnv_trigger
   WhenToTest SabotageMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and AgentType = assassin
          and DistanceCapital < 20
           and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary trebnik chance  10


 ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

 Trigger treb_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = spy
      and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_3
          and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary treb chance  20


    Trigger shifr_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
         and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_3
          and AgentType = spy
          and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary shifr chance  5


     Trigger agag_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = spy
      and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_2
          and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary agag chance  20


    Trigger trubka_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
         and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and AgentType = spy
          and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary trubka chance  5


        Trigger podzor_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
         and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and AgentType = spy
          and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary podzor chance  15

Trigger tre_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = priest
         and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary tre chance  20


    Trigger bomo_vnv_triger
    WhenToTest DenouncementMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and AgentType = inquisitor
          and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary bomo chance  33


    Trigger kombo_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = priest
         and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary kombo chance  5

    WhenToTest DenouncementMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and AgentType = inquisitor
          and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary zappo chance  10


        Trigger privo_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = priest
         and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary privo chance  10

    WhenToTest DenouncementMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and AgentType = inquisitor
          and  CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary poza chance  15


        Trigger loy_vnv_trigger
     WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_2
          and IsGeneral
and Attribute Loyalty < 4

AcquireAncillary loy chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger bandolier_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AssassinationMission
    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and MissionSucceeded
	  and not FactionType hungary
    AcquireAncillary bandolier chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hat_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition not AtSea
          and IsGeneral
          and CharacterNumTurnsIdle >= 3
	  and Attribute Piety >= 5
          and PopulationOwnReligion >= 70
	  and not FactionType hungary
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists hat
    AcquireAncillary hat chance  2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger handgunz_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= guild_of_inventors_2
          and IsGeneral
    AcquireAncillary handgunz chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger knight_cape_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and not Trait BattleDread > 0
          and not Trait StrategyDread > 0
	  and FactionType venice
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists knight_cape

    AcquireAncillary knight_cape chance  20


;------------------------------------------
Trigger chaos_steed_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables_1
          and Attribute Command >= 4
          and IsGeneral
          and not HasAncType Steed

    AcquireAncillary chaos_steed chance  30


;------------------------------------------
          Trigger gotaxe
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType poland
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Gotrek = 1

    AcquireAncillary gotaxe chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger hvdaranis_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
           and not FactionType hungary
	   and Attribute Piety >= 7
	   and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists hvdaranis

    AcquireAncillary hvdaranis chance  2

;------------------------------------------

Trigger ssolarius_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
           and not FactionType hungary
	   and Attribute Command >= 2
	   and Attribute Chivalry >= 3
	   and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ssolarius

    AcquireAncillary ssolarius chance  2
;------------------------------------------

Trigger grudgebook_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition CultureType greek
	and not FactionType aztecs
          and IsFactionLeader
          and IsGeneral
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists grudge

    AcquireAncillary grudge chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= brothel
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command > 3
	  and CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary hp_potionemp chance  3

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= m_explorers_guild
          and IsGeneral
	  and not FactionType mongols
	  and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary mapold chance  20

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= m_merchants_guild
          and IsGeneral
	  and not FactionType mongols
	  and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary mapold chance  5

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= market_3
          and IsGeneral
	  and not FactionType mongols
	  and not FactionType hungary

          and SettlementBuildingExists >= dwarven_tavern_2
          and IsGeneral
	  and not FactionType mongols
	  and not FactionType hungary

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= merchants_wharf
          and IsGeneral
	  and not FactionType mongols
	  and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary mapold chance  5

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
          and GeneralWithAncKilled mapold


    AcquireAncillary mapold chance  70

;------------------------------------------

Trigger mountaina_vnv_trigger
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= halls_of_elders_2
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= smith_3
          and IsGeneral
	  and CultureType greek
	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists mountaina

    AcquireAncillary mountaina chance  9

;------------------------------------------

Trigger bvalor_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition not WasAttacker
	   and IsGeneral
           and not FactionType hungary
	   and Attribute Chivalry >= 2
	   and Trait Brave >= 1
	   and WonBattle
           and GeneralFoughtInCombat


    AcquireAncillary bvalor chance  25


;------------------------------------------

Trigger coldone_vnv_trigger
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= chaos_barracks_2
                  and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command >= 3
	  and not FactionType england

    AcquireAncillary coldone chance  7

;------------------------------------------

Trigger jugger_vnv_trigger
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= chaos_barracks_3
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command >= 4
	  and CultureType Nord_culture
	  and Trait GoodCavalryGeneral >= 1

    AcquireAncillary jugger chance  40

;------------------------------------------

Trigger aldeath_vnv_trigger
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= chaos_barracks_1
                    and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command >= 3
	  and not FactionType england
	   and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists aldeath

    AcquireAncillary jugger chance  3

;------------------------------------------

  WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition not WasAttacker
	   and IsGeneral
           and not FactionType hungary
	   and WonBattle
           and GeneralFoughtInCombat
	   and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists hamjud

    AcquireAncillary hamjud chance  3

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 70
          and  CultureType southern_european
          and not HasAncType armor
           and not FactionType hungary
           and WonBattle
	   and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists armtarnus

    AcquireAncillary armtarnus chance  15

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.0
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 65
          and  CultureType greek
          and not HasAncType sword
           and WonBattle
	   and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists honaham

    AcquireAncillary honaham chance  15

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 70
          and  CultureType greek
          and not HasAncType sword
           and WonBattle
	   and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists runeham

    AcquireAncillary runeham chance  15




Trigger bosshead_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType turks
          and IsFactionLeader
          and IsGeneral
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists bosshead
          and Attribute Chivalry <= 1
          and not FactionType moors

    AcquireAncillary bosshead chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ragedagger_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AssassinationMission
    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and MissionSucceeded
    AcquireAncillary ragedagger chance  8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hseeker_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AssassinationMission
    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and MissionSucceeded
          and not FactionType england
    AcquireAncillary hseeker chance  8
;------------------------------------------

Trigger ragedagger2_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = assassin

    AcquireAncillary ragedagger chance  10
;------------------------------------------

Trigger hseeker_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and  not FactionType england

    AcquireAncillary hseeker chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dreadban_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= dark_elven_altair_1
          and not FactionType england
          and not HasAncType banner
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary dreadban chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger rindban_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not FactionType england
          and not HasAncType banner
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary rindban chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger rindban2_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= chaos_barracks_2
          and not FactionType england
          and not HasAncType banner
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary rindban chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dreadban2_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and not FactionType england
          and not HasAncType banner
          and Attribute Piety >= 4

    AcquireAncillary dreadban chance  5

;------------------------------------------

Trigger urskin_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition CultureType eastern_european
          and IsFactionLeader
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command = 3
          and Attribute Chivalry = -3
          and Attribute Authority = 2
          and Attribute Piety = 3
          and Trait Bloodthirsty = 3
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists urskin

    AcquireAncillary urskin chance  100

;------------------------------------------

Trigger ursarmor_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition CultureType eastern_european
          and IsFactionLeader
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command = 3
          and Attribute Chivalry = -3
          and Attribute Authority = 2
          and Attribute Piety = 3
          and Trait Bloodthirsty = 3
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists ursarmor

    AcquireAncillary ursarmor chance  100


;------------------------------------------
Trigger empsword5_vnv_trigger ;bugfix: put 5 to the middle
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= smith_3
          and IsGeneral
	  and not FactionType hungary
          and not HasAncType sword

    AcquireAncillary empsword chance  8

;------------------------------------------
          Trigger dtrinket
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType turks
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Savage = 1
          and Attribute Command = 5
          and Attribute Loyalty = 7
          and Attribute Piety = 0

    AcquireAncillary dtrinket chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger offsword_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks_4
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command >= 3
	  and not FactionType hungary
          and not HasAncType sword

    AcquireAncillary offsword chance  8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger medbook_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= tower_of_philosophy_1
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command >= 2
	  and not FactionType mongols

    AcquireAncillary medbook chance  7

;------------------------------------------
Trigger bugale_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= dwarven_tavern_3
          and IsGeneral
          and not HasAncType ale

    AcquireAncillary bugale chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dale_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= dwarven_tavern_2
          and IsGeneral
          and not HasAncType ale

    AcquireAncillary dale chance  10

;------------------------------------------

Trigger clolight_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = assassin
        and not FactionType england

    AcquireAncillary clolight chance  10
;------------------------------------------


Trigger clolight2_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = spy
        and not FactionType england

    AcquireAncillary clolight chance  10
;------------------------------------------

Trigger venomswo_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
	  and not FactionType england
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists venomswo
          and not HasAncType sword

    AcquireAncillary venomswo chance  30

;------------------------------------------

Trigger ruinswo_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
	  and not FactionType england
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists ruinswo
          and not HasAncType sword

    AcquireAncillary ruinswo chance  30

;------------------------------------------
Trigger assagun_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AssassinationMission
    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and MissionSucceeded
	  and not FactionType hungary
    AcquireAncillary assagun chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spellcloak_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Attribute Piety >= 4
	  and not FactionType mongols
          and not HasAncType Cape
          and Trait GoodCommander >= 3


    AcquireAncillary spellcloak chance  30


;------------------------------------------

Trigger sigmarhon_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest GeneralTakesCrusadeTarget
    Condition IsCrusade
          and not FactionType hungary

    AcquireAncillary sigmarhon chance  100

;------------------------------------------

              Trigger rihter_capitan
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition IsGeneral
          and not HasAncType sword
          and Trait Rihter = 1

    AcquireAncillary krugswo chance  100

;------------------------------------------

              Trigger krell_axe
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition IsGeneral
          and not HasAncType topor
          and Trait Krell = 1

    AcquireAncillary krell_axe chance  100

;------------------------------------------
          Trigger Valkia_armor_vnv_trigger
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType norway
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Valkia = 1

    AcquireAncillary Valkia_armor chance  100

;------------------------------------------
          Trigger Valkia_shield_vnv_trigger
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType norway
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Valkia = 1

    AcquireAncillary Valkia_shield chance  100

;------------------------------------------
          Trigger Valkia_spear_vnv_trigger
      WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
    Condition FactionType norway
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Valkia = 1

    AcquireAncillary Valkia_spear chance  100
